description.raw:
If the `INTEGRATION_static_map_plugin` test gets interrupted before it deletes its temporary folder, future invocations of the test will fail with the following console output:

~~~
[ RUN      ] StaticMapTest.StaticMapPlugin
unknown file: Failure
C++ exception with description "boost::filesystem::rename: Directory not empty: "/home/scpeters/.gazebo/models/map_satellite_37.386491_-122.065255_100_100", "/home/scpeters/.gazebo/models/map_satellite_37.386491_-122.065255_100_100_bk"" thrown in the test body.
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:135] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] StaticMapTest.StaticMapPlugin (1 ms)
~~~

This can be fixed by removing the backup folder before performing the rename operation.

title: static_map_plugin.cc: remove backup folder
